description: Contents: Yosef Ḳasṭel, Responsa to the questions about kabbalah posed by R. Yehudah Ḥayṭ (ff. 2r-18r). Yaʿaḳov ben Yaʿaḳov ha-Kohen, Perush merkhavat Yeḥezkiel (ff. 18r-39v). Joseph ben Abraham Gikatilla, Perush maʿaśeh merkhavah (ff. 39r-71(ii)v). Moses ben Shem Tov de Leon, Sefer ha-Shem (ff. 72r-143v). Moses ben Shem Tov de Leon, Mishkan ha-ʿedut (ff. 145v-215(iii)v). Baḥya ben Asher ben Ḥlava, Shulḥan shel ʾarbaʿ (ff. 216r-237r).
title: Collection of kabbalistic texts
author: Ḳasṭel, Yosef
